meanings.definition: An antifungal medication used to treat yeast infections.
meanings.sent1: I bought some clotrimazole to help with my yeast infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed clotrimazole for my fungal infection.
meanings.sent3: Clotrimazole is like a superhero fighting off the evil yeast invaders in my body.
meanings.sent4: The power of clotrimazole is like a shield protecting me from the fungal attack.
meanings.sent5: Using clotrimazole is like sending a battalion to battle against the yeast army in my system.

meanings.definition: A topical cream used to treat fungal skin infections.
meanings.sent1: My mom applied clotrimazole on my skin to heal the fungal infection.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended clotrimazole for my skin condition.
meanings.sent3: I feel like a wizard casting a spell with clotrimazole on my skin to banish the fungi.
meanings.sent4: Clotrimazole works like a gardener pruning away the fungal growth on my skin.
meanings.sent5: The scent of clotrimazole is a reminder of its battle against the fungi on my skin.
